    • Method Detail

      • getRights

        java.util.Vector getRights​(java.lang.Integer obj_id)
                    throws XmlRpcException
        Parameters:
        obj_id - objekt identifier
        Returns:
        vector of rights, each right as a vector of [0] User as String [1] Read as Boolean [2] Write as Boolean [3] Exec as Boolean [4] Inherit as Boolean [5] Editable as Boolean [6] Uname as String [7] User id as Integer
        Throws:
        XmlRpcException

        Returns:

        Throws:
